body:
Hi I am McFanta_ or known as Nicolai156. This is basicly my real account! You may know me as nicolai156. Usually that's my alt but I used it on avicus instead of this my real account. ALso basicly I am a massive rulebreaker which I am not proud about. My appeals are denied but let's don't talk about that. So let me tell a bit about me:


1. I am an ocn player.
2. I like coding.
3. I am banned here but let's don't talk about that.
4. I want to take a look at the avicus community.
5. EVen if I've been on the community on Nicolai156 for a while iI feel I am still very new.
6. I want to learn yml so I can make maps on Avicus!
7. I am norwegian!
8. I am okay at pvp.
9. I like anime :P.
10. That's everything lol :P.

Ask away some questions if you want to :P.

replies.body: Actually I have no idea. I am kinda busy to play ocn. Like too much school and other stuff. I play more clash of clans than ocn :P because I am very good at that game :P. I used to enjoy moderating before so I tried to see if I could make my way to that position on ocn. I tried but it got boring and I lost ocn friends :( but I got them back though :D!
